page.title: 04Employment in Alresford
page.content: Alresford does not have great potential as a source of employment and because of this many people seek work outside the village, often com- muting to either Colchester or London Within the village there are 3 main employment opportunities: the gravel works, cement works and the small but busy shopping centre. This consists of thirteen shops which together employ a total of thirty-five people. Although Alresford is basically seen as an agricultural area very few people actually work on the land. Due to a series of mergers there are now only 2 farms within the village and these are managed by outsiders who view agriculture as a profitable con- cern. The farms tend to be organised on a business footing with agents em- ployed by the investment companies concerned.
